about.intro: I'm Shalmoly, a Data Engineer building scalable data pipelines and analytics platforms.
about.description: I'm currently working on building robust data infrastructure and real-time analytics systems. I have a passion for transforming raw data into actionable insights and building systems that scale. Always had a thing for open-source, I contribute to various data engineering projects.
